# omergulcicek.com

> Personal website and blog of Omer Gulcicek, Staff Frontend Engineer. React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web development. Technical articles (Turkish), project showcases, experience timeline, and bookmarks. Built with Next.js 16, MDX, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

Site sections: Home (/), Blog (/blog), Experiences (/experiences), Projects (/projects), Bookmarks (/bookmarks), About (/about). Blog posts are in Turkish unless stated otherwise. Primary topics: React, Next.js, CSS, frontend architecture, state management, TanStack, form validation, accessibility, and developer tooling.

## About & Main Pages

- [About](https://omergulcicek.com/about): Bio, skills, services, and contact
- [Experiences](https://omergulcicek.com/experiences): Work and education timeline
- [Projects](https://omergulcicek.com/projects): Open source and side projects
- [Bookmarks](https://omergulcicek.com/bookmarks): Curated links and resources

## Blog - Technical (React, Next.js, Frontend)

- [Documentation for Machines: llms.txt and the AI-Native Era](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/makineler-icin-dokumantasyon-llms-txt-ai-native): llms.txt standard and AI-friendly documentation
- [React State Management Architecture](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-state-yonetim-mimarisi): React state management architecture
- [Next.js 16: Turbopack, Cache Components and the New Architecture Era](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/nextjs-16-turbopack-cache-components-ve-yeni-mimari-donemi): Next.js 16 and new architecture
- [TanStack Start: Resolving the tanstack-start-injected-head-scripts Error](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/tanstack-start-resolving-the-tanstack-start-injected-head-scripts-error): TanStack Start troubleshooting
- [React 19: Using the useOptimistic Hook](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-19-ile-gelen-yenilik-use-optimistic-hook-kullanimi): useOptimistic hook in React 19
- [React and AI Stack for 2026](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-ai-stack-2026): React and AI stack for 2026
- [Frontend's Rising Star: Meet shadcn/ui](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/frontendin-parlayan-yildizi-shadcn-ui-ile-tanisin): Introduction to shadcn/ui
- [Nizam - Next.js 16 Boilerplate](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/nizam-nextjs-16-boilerplate): Next.js 16 boilerplate project
- [Smart Mask and Validation for React Hook Form](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-hook-form-icin-akilli-mask-ve-dogrulama): Form masking and validation with React Hook Form

## Blog - CSS & Styling

- [New CSS Features Coming in 2026](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/2026da-hayatimiza-girecek-yeni-css-ozellikleri): New CSS features in 2026
- [CSS Container Queries](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/css-container-sorgulari): CSS container queries
- [CSS Logical Properties](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/css-mantiksal-ozellikler): CSS logical properties
- [Tailwind CSS v4](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/tailwind-css-v4): Tailwind CSS v4 overview

## Blog - Career & Environment

- [Being a Frontend Developer in 2025](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/2025-yilinda-frontend-developer-olmak): Frontend development in 2025
- [My Frontend Setup: Cursor, Extensions](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/frontend-calisma-ortamim-cursor-eklentiler): Cursor and dev environment
- [How to Become a Quality Software Developer?](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/kateliteli-yazilimci-nasil-olunur): Software quality and practices
